metadata.name: Ionnyk X Benjamin Spark - Crypto Girl #1/7
metadata.description:
IONNYK Digital Art Frame compatibility -  Large Format - 100x70cm
Medium: e-paper (millions of tiny ink capsules)
Artwork Size: 70x40cm

Exclusive experience:

*Artwork is only displayable on IONNYK Digital Art Frame (the certificate is available in your wallet like metamask) to bring a Slow Art Experience: For 7 days, the artwork will evolve to finally show the final artwork

* Artwork + IONNYK frame Digital Twin available in Metaverses upon request (Sandbox & Decentraland)

About the artwork : 

This woman is part of Benjamin Spark's news series called the « crypto girls » in relation to the field of digital art and NFT. All of Benjamin's crypto girls represent the power of women that can be expressed in their beauty, agility, strength and cleverness. The iconic reference to superheroes and science-fiction is a markup of our times as his art is directly influenced by his youth culture.

You have a question : info@ionnyk.com
